articles.title: Six Days in Fallujah creators defend their controversial shooter - Polygon
articles.description: Ahead of its Steam Early Access launch, Six Days in Fallujah developers and military consultants talk about the game’s goals ahead of a delayed launch.
articles.content: In 2009, Six Days in Fallujah, a video game based on real urban combat between American Marines and Iraqis between April and May of 2004, was canceled. The shooter had withered under negative media a… [+12591 chars]
